name: assignments
description: * Create a web application which accept data containing following fields in JSON format using TCP Socket and show  them in interactive widgets as per your choice. ```js         data['mode']    = mode of flying (String)         data['roll']    = roll angle (degrees)         data['pitch']   = pitch angle (degrees)         data['yaw']     = yaw angle (degrees)         data['heading'] = current heading (degrees)         data['long']    = current longitude (degrees)         data['lat']     = current latitude (degrees)         data['alt']     = current altitude ASL (meters)
